parameters.name: OtherCurve
parameters.description: Curve to intersect with this curve

title: ICurve.IIntersectCurve
description: Gets a set of points that represent the intersection of two trimmed curves.
signature:
System.Double IIntersectCurve( 
   Curve
OtherCurve
,
   ref System.Double
ThisStartPoint
,
   ref System.Double
ThisEndPoint
,
   ref System.Double
OtherStartPoint
,
   ref System.Double
OtherEndPoint
)

parameters.name: OtherCurve
parameters.description: Curve to intersect with this curve

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of doubles of the intersection points (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
The array of doubles returned contains the x, y, z location of the tessellation points and a code for each point that indicates the intersection class:
[
x1, y1, z1, k1, x2, y2, z2, k2....
]
Return codes are defined in
swIntersectionType_e
.
Before calling this method, call
ICurve::IIntersectCurveSize
to determine the size of the array needed for the return values from this method.
